title: Starbucks closes 8,000 stores for anti-bias training
text:
Starbucks closes 8,000 stores for anti-bias training Tuesday, May 29, 2018 - 01:28
Starbucks closed 8,000 of its company-owned U.S. stores on Tuesday as a first step in training 175,000 employees on racial tolerance. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Starbucks closed 8,000 of its company-owned U.S. stores on Tuesday as a first step in training 175,000 employees on racial tolerance. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2ITrJl9
